user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Perform a web-search to find how much e-kerosene and e-methanol can be imported into Europe in 2050, in Tj/hr. Add 2 new Gas Nodes called 'e-kerosene import' and 'e-methanol import'. Add 2 new Gas Fields with the same names, using the web‑search values as property data. Add 2 new Gas Pipelines from 'BE01' to each import node with unlimited capacity.
author: ChatGPT
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations on the TJ Sectoral Model according to the user's request, using PLEXOS CRUD pipelines and the google_search function where needed.

tasks.description: Search the web for the 2050 import potential into Europe (in TJ/hr) for e-kerosene and e-methanol.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, determine the appropriate query to retrieve the import capacities.

tasks.description: Create two Gas Nodes in the TJ Sectoral Model named 'e-kerosene import' and 'e-methanol import'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the Gas Node class and create objects with the specified names.
